original_text:
Marching Legions
L’avventura della bobina si svolge su un set di tre file e cinque bobine. Questi rotoli attraversano 243 modi per vincere, il che significa che le vittorie sono fatte per abbinare i simboli indipendentemente dalla posizione sulla riga. I giocatori troveranno un’alta varianza nelle Marching Legions, un ritorno teorico piuttosto impressionante per il giocatore del 98,12% e un potenziale di vincita massimo di 10.000x moltiplicato per la scommessa vincente.
Gli eserciti dell’antica Roma invadono i cinque rulli della slot online Marching Legions di Relax Gaming. La grafica in stile cartoon è caratterizzata da spade, striscioni e corone d’alloro, mentre pile di legionari conquistano interi rulli alla volta.
Questi simboli impilati scatenano respins, accumulando un metro e portando ad un giro bonus gratuito di giri. Avanzando attraverso una serie di ondate è possibile vincere 10.000x la tua scommessa totale durante i giochi gratuiti.
La Marching Legions slot machine è un gioco divertente e veloce con una percentuale di ritorno al giocatore eccezionalmente alta del 98,12%.
Una grafica da Antica Roma
Relax Gaming ci porta in una piazza pubblica dell’antica Roma dove l’attrazione principale sono i legionari che rappresentano il simbolo che definisce il gioco. Questo simbolo viene fornito in singole unità per coprire una piazza sulla griglia, ma essendo legioni, e marciando verso di essa, invita quel simbolo ad apparire in pile lungo tutto il mulinello.
Il campo visivo sulle fessure delle Legioni in marcia è pieno di movimento. I soldati marciano verso il reel-set, ci sono slam e thuds quando la caratteristica di spinta si innesca, e pochi altri bit e pezzi visivi che rendono il gioco divertente. I simboli sono disegnati in modo simile a un videogioco, con un totale di tre simboli a basso costo, tre simboli ad alto costo e i legionari.
Mentre si carica il gioco sul PC o sul cellulare, c’è una bella sequenza animata in cui i soldati iniziano la loro marcia sotto un sole cocente. La scena si trasforma poi in una vista a volo d’uccello di una strada romana, con un tempio sopra, e statue sotto.
La griglia di simboli 5×3 è abilmente intrecciata nella pietra della strada. È necessario atterrare tre o più simboli corrispondenti attraverso i rulli, dal lato sinistro, e si hanno 243 modi diversi di vincere.
Insieme ai soldati romani e ad altri simboli a tema di valore superiore, vedrete un’aquila a effetto pietra, un tempio e il profilo di Cesare. Una colonna sonora che potrebbe derivare da un film epico romano accompagna il gioco.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Relax Gaming ha fornito ai giocatori il layout familiare per i controlli e i pulsanti del gioco. Questi si trovano sotto il reel-set, nella parte inferiore dello schermo. Qui i giocatori possono impostare il gameplay che li attende o modificare le impostazioni in qualsiasi momento.
Per iniziare a far girare le bobine e invitare le figurine delle Marching Legions slot, premere il pulsante a doppia freccia in basso al centro. Questo fa sì che i rulli girino una volta per la scommessa attiva. Un altro modo di giocare è a mani libere. Questo è possibile con l’opzione autoplay.
Premere il pulsante a destra di Spin per aprire il menu dove è possibile selezionare i preset dei giri automatici. Ci sono delle impostazioni opzionali che permettono ai giocatori di impostare dei limiti di spesa, o di far cessare la modalità autoplay quando si attiva la funzione bonus.
Infine, ma non meno importante, c’è il pulsante sonoro nell’angolo in basso a sinistra dello schermo e il menu, dove i giocatori possono visualizzare le regole del gioco o sfogliare la tabella dei pagamenti. Le scommesse in Marching Legions iniziano a 10 centesimi per giro e terminano a un massimo di 100,00 euro.
Il gioco ha due modificatori di bobina. Uno è il Marching Respins. Si innesca quando una pila di tre legionari cade sui rulli. I soldati faranno marciare una bobina a sinistra per ogni turno rimanente, fino all’uscita delle bobine. Ogni pila aggiuntiva risulta in un’altra serie di respin.
L’atterraggio di due o più pile di legionari può innescare una caratteristica di spinta, che fa sì che la pila si riempia e inneschi il respin.
Il bonus dei giri liberi si innesca quando ci sono state cinque pile di legionari che hanno marciato verso il mulinello più a sinistra. Gli Spin liberi arrivano a ondate. Ogni ondata inizia con una pila di soldati che parte dal quinto rullo e marcia verso il primo.
la funzione Buy Feature permette di acquistare la funzione a un enorme 120x moltiplicato per la scommessa.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Naturalmente, la vita romana non era tutta una marcia attraverso l’Impero. A loro piaceva anche una buona festa, che è il soggetto della slot online Roman Revelry di High 5 Games. Si tratta di un altro cinque rulli, 243 modi per vincere il gioco con un’estetica da cartone animato. Gli dei romani si divertono in un giardino, scatenando giri gratis. Una caratteristica Blinking Buck porta ad un grande pagamento di credito, o l’ingresso ad un jackpot round.
Un film epico arriva nei casinò online con la slot machine Gladiator della Playtech. Immagini reali del cast principale (meno Russell Crowe), appaiono sulle cinque bobine e 25 linee. Le caratteristiche includono un prize-pickpot round e una funzione di giri gratis che può portare le ricchezze di Roma a voi in qualsiasi giro.

raw_translation.response:
Marching Legions Review

Get ready for an adventure on the reels with Marching Legions, a slot game that features a set of three rows and five reels with 243 ways to win. With high variance, a player can expect an impressive theoretical return of 98.12% and the potential to win up to 10,000 times the amount wagered.

Relax Gaming brings the armies of ancient Rome to the reels of Marching Legions online slot. With cartoon-style graphics featuring swords, banners, and laurel wreaths, piles of legionnaires conquer entire reels at a time.

These stacked symbols trigger respins, accumulating a meter and leading to a free spins bonus round. Advancing through a series of waves can lead to a win of up to 10,000 times the total bet during the free games.

The Marching Legions slot machine is a fun and fast-paced game with an exceptionally high return to player percentage of 98.12%.

Graphics from Ancient Rome

Relax Gaming takes us to a public square in ancient Rome where the main attraction is the legionnaires, the defining symbol of the game. This symbol comes in single units to cover a square on the grid, but being legions, they march towards it, inviting that symbol to appear in piles along the entire reel.

The visual field on the Marching Legions slot is full of movement. The soldiers march towards the reel-set, there are slams and thuds when the respin feature is triggered, and a few other visual bits and pieces that make the game fun. The symbols are drawn similarly to a video game, with a total of three low-cost symbols, three high-cost symbols, and the legionnaires.

As the game loads on PC or mobile, there is a beautiful animated sequence where soldiers begin their march under a scorching sun. The scene then transforms into an overhead view of a Roman road, with a temple above and statues below.

The 5x3 symbol grid is skillfully intertwined in the stone of the road. Players must land three or more matching symbols across the reels from the left-hand side, with 243 different ways to win.

Along with Roman soldiers and other higher value theme symbols, players will see an eagle in stone effect, a temple, and the profile of Caesar. A soundtrack that could derive from an epic Roman movie accompanies the game.

Features and Symbols of the Slot Machine

Relax Gaming has provided players with the familiar layout for game controls and buttons. These are located beneath the reel-set at the bottom of the screen. Here, players can set up the gameplay that awaits them or change settings at any time.

To start the reels spinning and bring the Marching Legions characters to life, press the double arrow button in the center at the bottom. This makes the reels spin once for the active bet. Another way to play is hands-free with the autoplay option.

Press the button to the right of Spin to open the menu where you can select preset autoplay spins. There are optional settings that allow players to set spending limits, or to stop autoplay mode when the bonus feature is triggered.

Last but not least, there is a sound button in the bottom left-hand corner of the screen and a menu, where players can view the game rules or browse the paytable. Bets in Marching Legions start at 10 cents per spin and end at a maximum of 100.00 euros.

The game has two reel modifiers. One is the Marching Respins which is triggered when a stack of three legionnaires falls on the reels. The soldiers will march one reel to the left for each remaining turn, until the reels exit. Each additional stack results in another series of respins.

Landing two or more stacks of legionnaires can trigger a push feature, which causes the stack to fill up and trigger the respin.

The free spins bonus is triggered when five stacks of legionnaires have marched towards the leftmost reel. The free spins come in waves. Each wave starts with a stack of soldiers departing from the fifth reel and marching towards the first.

The Buy Feature function allows you to purchase the feature at a whopping 120x multiplied by the bet.

Similar Slot Machines

Of course, Roman life wasn't all about marching across the Empire. They also enjoyed a good party, which is the subject of the High 5 Games' Roman Revelry online slot. It's another five-reel, 243-ways-to-win game with a cartoonish aesthetic. Roman gods have fun in a garden, triggering free spins. A Blinking Buck feature leads to a big credit payout or entrance to a jackpot round.

An epic film arrives in online casinos with the Playtech Gladiator slot machine. Real images of the main cast (minus Russell Crowe) appear on the five reels and 25 lines. Features include a prize-pickpot round and a free spins feature that can bring the riches of Rome to you on any spin.

Le scommesse in Marching Legions iniziano a 10 centesimi per giro e terminano a un massimo di 100,00 euro.

Marching Legions
The adventure of the reels takes place on a set of three rows and five reels. These reels traverse 243 ways to win, which means that wins are made by matching symbols regardless of their position on the line. Players will find high variance in Marching Legions, an impressive theoretical return to player of 98.12% and a maximum win potential of 10,000x multiplied by the winning bet.

The armies of ancient Rome invade the five reels of Relax Gaming's Marching Legions online slot. The cartoon-style graphics feature swords, banners, and laurel wreaths, while piles of legionnaires conquer entire reels at a time. These stacked symbols trigger respins, accumulating a meter and leading to a free spin bonus round. Advancing through a series of waves, it is possible to win 10,000x your total bet during the free games.

Marching Legions slot machine is a fun and fast-paced game with an exceptionally high return to player percentage of 98.12%.

Ancient Rome graphics
Relax Gaming takes us to a public square in ancient Rome where the main attraction is the legionnaires representing the defining symbol of the game. This symbol is provided in single units to cover a square on the grid, but being legions, and marching towards it, invites that symbol to appear in stacks along the entire reel. 

The visual field on the Marching Legions slots is full of movement. Soldiers march towards the reel-set, there are slams and thuds when the push feature triggers, and a few other visual bits and pieces that make the game fun. The symbols are drawn similar to a video game, with a total of three low-cost symbols, three high-cost symbols, and the legionnaires. 

As the game loads on PC or mobile, there is a beautiful animated sequence where soldiers start their march under a scorching sun. The scene then transforms into a bird's-eye view of a Roman road, with a temple above, and statues below. The 5x3 symbol grid is skillfully intertwined in the stone of the road. You need to land three or more matching symbols across the reels, from the left side, you have 243 different ways to win. 

Alongside the Roman soldiers and other high-value theme symbols, you'll see a stone-effect eagle, a temple, and Caesar's profile. A soundtrack that could come from an epic Roman movie accompanies the game.

Slot Machine Features and Symbols
Relax Gaming has provided players with the familiar layout for game controls and buttons. These are located below the reel-set, at the bottom of the screen. Here players can set up the gameplay that awaits them or change the settings at any time.

To start spinning the reels and invite Marching Legions figurines, press the double arrow button at the bottom center. This causes the reels to spin once for the active bet. Another way to play is hands-free. This is possible with the autoplay option.

Press the button to the right of Spin to open the menu where you can select preset autoplay spins. There are optional settings that allow players to set spending limits or stop autoplay mode when the bonus feature is triggered.

Finally, but not least, there is the sound button in the bottom-left corner of the screen and the menu, where players can view the game rules or browse the paytable. Bets in Marching Legions start at 10 cents per spin and end at a maximum of 100.00 euros.

The game has two reel modifiers. One is the Marching Respins. It is triggered when a stack of three legionnaires falls on the reels. The soldiers will march a reel to the left for every remaining turn, until the reels exit. Each additional stack results in another series of respins.

Landing two or more stacks of legionnaires can trigger a push feature, which causes the stack to fill up and trigger the respin.

The free spins bonus is triggered when there have been five stacks of legionnaires that have marched towards the leftmost reel. Free Spins come in waves. Each wave starts with a stack of soldiers leaving the fifth reel and marching towards the first.

The Buy Feature function allows you to buy the feature at a huge 120x multiplied by the bet.

Naturally, Roman life was not all marching through the Empire. They also enjoyed a good party, which is the subject of High 5 Games' Roman Revelry online slot. It is another five-reel, 243 ways-to-win game with a cartoon aesthetic. Roman gods have fun in a garden, triggering free spins. A Blinking Buck feature leads to a big credit payout or entry into a jackpot round.

An epic film arrives in online casinos with Playtech's Gladiator slot machine. Real images of the main cast (minus Russell Crowe) appear on the five reels and 25 lines. Features include a prize-pickpot round and a free spins feature that can bring the riches of Rome to you in any spin.
